desc: This book constitutes the refereed proceedings of the 16th International Conference on Software Reuse, ICSR 2017, held in Salvador, Brazil, in May 2017.
title: Mastering Scale and Complexity in Software Reuse: 16th International Conference on Software Reuse, ICSR 2017, Salvador, Brazil, May 29-31, 2017, Proceedings (Lecture Notes in Computer Science)
